metadata.title: CVE-2022-49043 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
xmlXIncludeAddNode in xinclude.c in libxml2 before 2.11.0 has ause-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-49043` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.13+dfsg-1ubuntu0.5
libxml2-utils - 2.9.13+dfsg-1ubuntu0.5
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.13+dfsg-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.13+dfsg-1ubuntu0.5').
